reviews.comment:
I recently tried an anticellulite massage and was genuinely impressed with the results. The treatment not only helped improve the texture and appearance of my skin, but it also left me feeling more relaxed and energized. After just a few sessions, I noticed a visible reduction in cellulite and improved circulation in the targeted areas.

A huge part of the positive experience was thanks to Tini, the therapist. She is incredibly skilled, attentive, and knowledgeable. Tini took the time to understand my concerns and tailored the massage to suit my needs. Her technique was firm yet comfortable, and she explained each step of the process, which made me feel completely at ease.

If you're considering trying anticellulite massage, I highly recommend booking a session with Tini. She truly makes a difference!

reviewReply.comment: Thank you so much for your detailed and glowing review, Verica! We're thrilled to hear about the positive results you experienced from the anticellulite massage. Tini will be delighted to know that her skill, care, and personalized approach made such a difference for you. We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back soon! -Cocoon Team

reviews.name: accounts/109616517437403268640/locations/5135673551050654657/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNvd3R5Rjh3RRAB

reviews.comment:
I had a wonderful time at Cocoon Medical Spa in Canggu. I had a few treatments, and they were all great! The receptionist was lovely, as we're Dr Eva and the rest of the staff.
I would highly recommend it there, it was professional, clean and a very pleasant experience! Especially the Hydra Facial. 10/10!

reviewReply.comment: Hi Sharan, Thank you so much for your kind words and glowing feedback! We're delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful experience at Cocoon Medical Spa in Canggu. It's great to know that our team, including Dr. Eva and our lovely receptionist, helped make your visit so enjoyable. We're especially glad you loved the HydraFacial! We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back again soon! -Cocoon Team

reviews.comment: I came into the clinic with red, sensitive and dry skin from the sun/sea/pollution in Bali. My therapist Tini was very professional and I came out  of the treatment with rejuvenated, hydrated and a much calmer skin!

It’s wonderful to hear you left feeling rejuvenated and hydrated. We hope to welcome you back soon for more pampering!

reviews.comment: I got the Cocoon signature hydra facial with Tini. Tini was excellent and made sure that I was comfortable the whole time. My skin looks and feels so much better. Also, the front desk staff including Sri were sooo kind and welcoming.

We can’t wait to welcome you back for more amazing treatments!

reviewReply.comment: Thank you so much for your glowing review! We’re thrilled to hear that you had such a luxurious and relaxing experience at Cocoon Medical Spa in Canggu. reviews.comment:
(Translated by Google) I had a wonderful facial (Cocoon Signature 360) with Tini. In addition to a deep and rejuvenating facial, I also received an incredible shoulder, arm, and hand massage.
I will definitely be back for a full-body massage and will definitely ask for Tini again; she's amazing.
If you want professional treatment in a clean, modern setting with expert staff... this is the place!

(Original)
Ho fatto un meraviglioso trattamento viso (cocoon signature 360) con Tini. Oltre a una pulizia viso profonda e ringiovanente mi è stato anche fatto un massaggio spalle, braccia e mani incredibile.
Tornerò sicuramente per un massaggio full body e chiederò sicuramente ancora di Tini che è pazzesca.
Se volete prendervi cura di voi in modo professionale, in un luogo pulito, moderno e con persone esperte… questo è il posto giusto!

reviewReply.comment: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so happy that you had such a positive experience with the Cocoon Signature 360 ​​facial and that Tini made you feel so pampered. It is great to hear that you had such a good time and that our environment left a good impression on you. We look forward to welcoming you again for a full body massage!
